en_us: Come into contact with a support Enderman
This module allows Endermen to aid nearby hostiles in their fight against the player!
Endermen will buff nearby hostile mobs, giving them extra abilities.\n\nSome mobs get potion effects, while other mobs give effects when nearby.
- Creepers get Regeneration II\n- Cave Spiders get Jump Boost II\n- Silverfish get Resistance II

- Spiders get Jump Boost I
-Zombies get Speed II
-Skeletons give Weakness II
- Shulkers give Blindness
